TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
WHICH ARE ASSIGNED TO ALL FRESH WATERS WITHIN THE WAPPINGER CREEK DRAINAGE
BASIN, DUTCHESS COUNTY, NEW YORK

No. Waters Index

Number

Name

Description

Wappinger Creek

From mouth to P 365 (Wappinger Lake). Enters Hudson

River from east at New Hamburg, N.Y. Wappinger Lake is located immediately
north of Village of Wappingers Falls, New York. O-24sw
